p.name: Peta
p.writing: Draw a vertical line from top to bottom, then draw a curve across the top third, connecting to the vertical line on both ends.

b.name: Beta
b.writing: Draw a vertical line from top to bottom, then draw a curve across the top third, connecting to the vertical line on both ends. Add a small circle below the curve in the middle.

t.name: Teta
t.writing: Draw a vertical line from top to bottom, then draw a horizontal line across the top third.

d.name: Delta
d.writing: Draw a vertical line from top to bottom, then draw a horizontal line across the top third, and add a small circle below the horizontal line in the middle.

k.name: Kappa
k.writing: Draw a vertical line from top to bottom. Starting from the middle, draw two diagonal lines, one upwards and one downwards.

g.name: Gamma
g.writing: Draw a vertical line from top to bottom. Starting from the middle, draw two diagonal lines, one upwards and one downwards. Add a circle at the intersection of the diagonal lines.

n.name: Nen
n.writing: Draw a horizontal line from left to right, then draw a vertical line from the right end of the horizontal line to the bottom left.

m.name: Mem
m.writing: Draw a vertical line from top to bottom, then draw a diagonal line from the top of the vertical line to the center. Draw another diagonal line from the center to the top of another vertical line on the right. Finally, draw that vertical line from top to bottom.
